comments.body: Can we create a new method for this?  I accept that it's not specific to loopback, but the symmetric `ApplyTo` on all options is very easy to follow.  Then this could be `ApplyToServingInfo` or some such.  Still available, but the symmetric calls stay symmetric.
I would prefer to leave this as it is in this PR. We have more of those cases. We should uniformely change the names. Also this would have ripples into a number of other components.

> I would prefer to leave this as it is in this PR. We have more of those cases. We should uniformely change the names. Also this would have ripples into a number of other components.

Ok.
